person.persName: Mortimer Murray Benton (Kenton County attorney and mayor)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney and politician. Benton, New York, native. Married to Angelina Clemons Benton in 1832. Father of Mortimer Benton, John Benton, and William Benton. Studied law in Indiana, Cincinnati, Ohio, and Covington. Mayor of Covington from 1834 to 1835. Member of Covington City Council from 1839 to 1851. President of the Covington & Lexington Railroad from 1853 to 1856. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1863 to 1865. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1865 to 1866.
